author: Al Jazeera
title: Russia says it could target Western arms supplies to Ukraine
description: ‘Pumping of weapons from a number of countries … turns these convoys into legitimate targets’, Russian deputy FM says.
content:
Russia has said its troops could target supplies of Western weapons in Ukraine, where the Russian army has been advancing since late February.
